R

Receiver<T> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
A receiver of objects.
recover(Function<? super Throwable, ? extends T>) - Method in class com.google.android.agera.Result
Returns the output value if the attempt has succeeded, or the resulting value of applying the given recoverFunction to the failure of the attempt.
removeUpdatable(Updatable) - Method in class com.google.android.agera.BaseObservable
 
removeUpdatable(Updatable) - Method in interface com.google.android.agera.Observable
Removes updatable from the Observable.
Repositories - Class in com.google.android.agera
Utility methods for obtaining Repository instances.
repository(T) - Static method in class com.google.android.agera.Repositories
Returns a static Repository of the given object.
Repository<T> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
An Observable Supplier of data.
RepositoryCompilerStates - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Container of the compiler state interfaces supporting the declaration of Repositorys using the type-safe declarative language.
RepositoryCompilerStates.RConfig<TVal> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to configure and end the declaration of the repository.
RepositoryCompilerStates.REventSource<TVal,TStart> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to specify the event source of the repository.
RepositoryCompilerStates.RFlow<TVal,TPre,TSelf extends RepositoryCompilerStates.RFlow<TVal,TPre,TSelf>> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to specify the next directive of the data processing flow.
RepositoryCompilerStates.RFrequency<TVal,TStart> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to specify the frequency of invoking the data processing flow.
RepositoryCompilerStates.RSyncFlow<TVal,TPre,TSelf extends RepositoryCompilerStates.RSyncFlow<TVal,TPre,TSelf>> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to specify the final synchronous steps of the data processing flow.
RepositoryCompilerStates.RTermination<TVal,TTerm,TRet> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
Compiler state allowing to terminate the data processing flow following a failed check.
RepositoryConfig - Annotation Type in com.google.android.agera
Constants controlling some behaviors of the compiled Repositorys.
repositoryWithInitialValue(T) - Static method in class com.google.android.agera.Repositories
Starts the declaration of a compiled repository.
Reservoir<T> - Interface in com.google.android.agera
A buffering mechanism that enqueues the values received via the Receiver interface and offers them back through the Repository interface.
reservoir() - Static method in class com.google.android.agera.Reservoirs
Same as Reservoirs.reservoirOf(Class).
reservoir(Queue<T>) - Static method in class com.google.android.agera.Reservoirs
Returns a Reservoir that uses the given queue as the backing storage for enqueuing and dequeuing values.
reservoirOf(Class<T>) - Static method in class com.google.android.agera.Reservoirs
Returns a Reservoir for the given value type.
Reservoirs - Class in com.google.android.agera
Utility methods for creating Reservoir instances.
RESET_TO_INITIAL_VALUE - Static variable in annotation type com.google.android.agera.RepositoryConfig
The repository value should reset to the initial value on deactivation.
Result<T> - Class in com.google.android.agera
An immutable object encapsulating the result of an attempt.
